document.full_text: search giant google inc has settled with u.s. regulators investigating privacy problems that cropped up in its botched roll-out of social network buzz, the federal trade commission said on wednesday.
document.title: ftc settles with google over buzz roll-out
lines_and_colors: search giant google inc has settled with u.s. regulators investigating privacy problems that cropped up in its botched roll-out of social network buzz, the federal trade commission said on wednesday.
